facts.text: I can recognize my human! I know who feeds me and get excited when I see them coming.
I like to redecorate! I move rocks, plants, and gravel around my tank to make it just how I like it.
I'm one of the smartest fish! I can learn tricks and solve simple puzzles to get treats.
I have a fake eye spot near my tail called an ocellus! It confuses predators about which end is my head.
I can grow really fast! With lots of food, I can grow over an inch per month when I'm young.
